name: Zezinho do Bairro Adventures
description:
A game about adventures and having a lot of fun mechanics and little Easter eggs, currently one achievement in the game that lies in the feast table of the almighty goat overseer and there are 2 phases in the game both of them having Easter eggs, phase 1 is getting to a mysterious portal in the plains while something colossal is running after you (tip 1: you may find something behind the creature) and phase 2 is the final boss which has made an alliance with the goat lord and got a few goat rammers to attack you as well as having his powerful mana attack  to obliterate anything that touches it ( tip 2: you may just jump these attacks or die) meanwhile a red wall sliding through the ground to kill you (tip 3: you may want to look more closely to the wall) .

(Probably) Future features

- Weapons

- New bosses

- New levels

- The Sinister Red Dot (TSRD) :)

In-Game Testing (if you want)

Press H and become legit un-killable (really)
